mapper.select: SELECT /* TKPUKI08700_getAgencyList_소속대리점 목록 */ DISTINCT AGENCY_CD FROM (SELECT UKEY_AGENCY_CD /* UKEY대리점코드 */ FROM TBAS_AGENCY_MAPP WHERE DEL_YN /* 삭제여부 */ = 'N' UNION ALL SELECT UKEY_AGENCY_CD /* UKEY대리점코드 */ AGENCY_CD FROM TBAS_DEAL_CO_MGMT WHERE DEALCO_CL_CD1 /* 거래처구분코드1 */ = 'A1' AND DEL_YN /* 삭제여부 */ = 'N')
SELECT /*+ INDEX_DESC(XTKP_BLINE_IF_01) */ UKEY_AGENCY_CD , UKEY_SUB_CD , UKEY_CHANNEL_CD FROM TTKP_BLINE_IF WHERE SKB_SVC_MGMT_NUM = #{SKB_SVC_MGMT_NUM} AND PROC_TYP = '4' LIMIT 1

SELECT /* TKPUKI08700_getAgencyMapp_대리점Mappaing_유선_김연석_김연석 */ MAPP_AGENCY_CD /* 매핑대리점코드 */ , COMPANY_CL_CD /* 회사구분코드 */ FROM TBAS_AGENCY_MAPP WHERE UKEY_AGENCY_CD /* UKEY대리점코드 */ = #{AGENCY_CD} AND DEL_YN /* 삭제여부 */ = 'N'

SELECT /* TKPUKI08700_getUserMapp_사용자Mappaing_유선_김연석_김연석 */ MAPP_LOGIN_ID /* 매핑로그인ID */ , COMPANY_CL_CD /* 회사구분코드 */ FROM TBAS_USER_MAPP WHERE LOGIN_USER_ID /* 로그인사용자ID */ = #{LOGIN_ID} AND DEL_YN /* 삭제여부 */ = 'N'

SELECT /* TKPUKI08700_getUserIdExist_처리자 정보 취득_유선_김연석_김연석 */ COUNT(USER_ID /* 사용자ID */ ) EXST_CNT FROM TBAS_USER_MGMT WHERE UKEY_ID /* UKEY_ID */ = #{U_KEY_ID} AND EFF_USER_YN /* 유효사용자여부 */ = 'Y' AND DEL_YN /* 삭제여부 */ = 'N'

SELECT /* TKPUKI08700_getUserIdExist_처리자 정보 취득_유선_김연석_김연석 */ USER_ID /* 사용자ID */ FROM TBAS_USER_MGMT WHERE UKEY_ID /* UKEY_ID */ = #{U_KEY_ID} AND EFF_USER_YN /* 유효사용자여부 */ = 'Y' AND DEL_YN /* 삭제여부 */ = 'N'
SELECT /* TKPUKI08700_getModelCdExist_코드존재유무파악_김연석_김연석 */ count(PROD_CD /* 상품코드 */ ) EXST_CNT FROM tbas_prod_mgmt WHERE PROD_CD /* 상품코드 */ = #{EQP_MDL} AND DEL_YN /* 삭제여부 */ = 'N'
SELECT /* TKPUKI08700_getSaleChannel_판매채널 Check_김연석_김연석 */ NVL(FTKP_GET_SALE_CHNL(#{CHNL_CD}), 'N') SALE_CHNL FROM DUAL

SELECT /* TKPUKI08700_getBLineIFNone_유선상품 미처리 정보 취득_유선_김연석_김연석 */ PROC_DT , FBAS_GET_COMMCDNM_VAL('ZTKP_C_00080', PROC_TYP) PROC_TYP_NM FROM TTKP_BLINE_IF WHERE SKB_SVC_MGMT_NUM = #{SKB_SVC_MGMT_NUM} AND ps_apnd_yn = 'N' AND ((op_dt < #{OP_DT}) or (op_dt = #{OP_DT} and op_tm < #{OP_TM} ) or (op_dt = #{OP_DT} and op_tm = #{OP_TM} and seq < #{SEQ} ) ) LIMIT 1

SELECT SUBSTR(A.SVC_DTM, 1, 8) SVC_DT , C.UKEY_AGENCY_CD /* UKEY대리점코드 */ , IFNULL(C.UKEY_SUB_CD /* UKEY서브점코드 */ , '0000') UKEY_SUB_CD /* UKEY서브점코드 */ , C.SKT_CHNL_CD /* UKEY채널코드 */ , C.DEALCO_CD /* 거래처코드 */ SALE_PLC , A.SVC_PLC , A.SVC_NUM , A.SALE_CHGRG_ID , ( SELECT CASE WHEN SUBSTR(A.SVC_DTM, 1, 6) = SUBSTR(#{PROC_DT}, 1, 6) THEN CASE SUBSTR(A.SALE_DTL_TYP, 1, 2) WHEN 'S1' THEN '01' WHEN 'S2' THEN '02' ELSE '03' END ELSE '03' END CASE FROM DUAL ) CELL_SCRB_TYP FROM TSAL_GENERAL_SALE A , TSAL_EQUIPMENT_SALE B , TBAS_DEAL_CO_MGMT C WHERE A.GNRL_SALE_NO = B.GNRL_SALE_NO AND A.GNRL_SALE_CHG_SEQ = B.GNRL_SALE_CHG_SEQ AND A.SALE_PLC = C.DEALCO_CD /* 거래처코드 */ AND A.SALE_DTM BETWEEN C.EFF_STA_DTM /* 유효시작일시 */ AND C.EFF_END_DTM /* 유효종료일시 */ AND A.SVC_MGMT_NUM = #{SVC_MGMT_NUM} AND B.EQP_MDL_CD = #{EQP_MDL_CD} AND B.EQP_SER_NUM = #{EQP_SER_NUM} LIMIT 1 /* 판매변경이력으로 여러건이 조회되는 것을 방지 */
SELECT /* TKPUKI08700_getDealMapping_DCODE통합매핑_김도엽 */ FBAS_GET_DEAL_MAPPING('A', #{UKEY_AGENCY_CD}, #{UKEY_SUB_CD}) as DEAL_MAP_INFO FROM dual

SELECT /* TKPUKI08700_getBLineInfo_유선상품 처리상태 정보 취득_유선_김연석_김연석 */ SKB_SALE_NO, SKB_SALE_CHG_SEQ , PROC_STAT, FBAS_GET_COMMCDNM_VAL('ZTKP_C_00080', PROC_STAT) PROC_NM , ACPT_DT, ACPT_PLC, ACPT_CHRGR_ID , ACPT_CNCL_DT, ACPT_CNCL_PLC, ACPT_CNCL_CHRGR_ID , SVC_DT, SVC_PLC, SVC_CHRGR_ID , TERM_DT, TERM_PLC, TERM_CHRGR_ID , STOP_DT, STOP_PLC, STOP_CHRGR_ID , STOP_CNCL_DT, STOP_CNCL_PLC, STOP_CNCL_CHRGR_ID , RMKS FROM TTKP_BLINE_MGMT WHERE SKB_SVC_MGMT_NUM = #{SKB_SVC_MGMT_NUM} AND del_yn = 'N'

SELECT /*+ TKPUKI08700_getBlineMgmtSeqAB_김연석 */ CASE WHEN #{SL_CL} = '01' THEN 'RB' || LPAD(TTKP_RB_SEQ.NEXTVAL, 9, '0') WHEN #{SL_CL} = '02' THEN 'AB' || LPAD(TTKP_AB_SEQ.NEXTVAL, 9, '0') WHEN #{SL_CL} = '03' THEN 'OB' || LPAD(TTKP_OB_SEQ.NEXTVAL, 9, '0') WHEN #{SL_CL} = '04' THEN 'SB' || LPAD(TTKP_SB_SEQ.NEXTVAL, 9, '0') ELSE 'MB' || LPAD(TTKP_MB_SEQ.NEXTVAL, 9, '0') END SALE_NO FROM DUAL
mapper.insert: INSERT /*+ TKPUKI08700_addSvcTypLst_유선고객 서비스유형 저장_김연석_김연석 */ INTO TTKP_SVCTYP_LST ( PACKAGE_NO , SKB_SALE_NO , PROC_SEQ , SKB_SVC_MGMT_NUM , PROD_CL , CUST_CL , CUST_NM , CELL_SVC_NUM , SKB_SVC_NUM , EQP_MDL_CD , CELL_PHONE_TYP , CELL_SVC_PLC , CELL_PHONE_SVC_DT , PROC_STAT , PROC_DT , PROC_PLC , CUST_NO , USCAN_ACPT_DTM , DEL_YN , UPD_CNT , INS_USER_ID , INS_DTM , MOD_USER_ID , MOD_DTM) SELECT PACKAGE_NO , SKB_SALE_NO , (SELECT IFNULL(MAX(PROC_SEQ), 0) + 1 FROM TTKP_SVCTYP_LST WHERE PACKAGE_NO = #{PACKAGE_NO} AND SKB_SALE_NO = #{SKB_SALE_NO} ) PROC_SEQ , SKB_SVC_MGMT_NUM , PROD_CL , CUST_CL , CUST_NM , CELL_SVC_NUM , SKB_SVC_NUM , EQP_MDL_CD , CELL_PHONE_TYP , CELL_SVC_PLC , CELL_PHONE_SVC_DT , PROC_STAT , PROC_DT , PROC_PLC , CUST_NO , USCAN_ACPT_DTM , 'N' , 0 , #onlineContext.userInfo.loginId# , DATE_FORMAT(sysdate(), '%Y%m%d%H%i%s') , #onlineContext.userInfo.loginId# , DATE_FORMAT(sysdate(), '%Y%m%d%H%i%s' ) FROM TTKP_BLINE_MGMT A WHERE SKB_SALE_NO = #{SKB_SALE_NO} AND SKB_SALE_CHG_SEQ = #{SKB_SALE_CHG_SEQ}

INSERT /*+ TKPUKI08700_addBlineSuplIf_유선상품 I/F 자료 저장_김연석_김연석 */ INTO TTKP_BLINE_SUPL_IF ( op_dt , op_tm , seq , supl_svc_cd , del_yn , upd_cnt , ins_user_id , ins_dtm , mod_user_id , mod_dtm ) VALUES ( #{OP_DT} , #{OP_TM} , #{SEQ} , #{SUPL_SVC_CD} , 'N' , 1 , 'TkpSwingWireRsal' , DATE_FORMAT(sysdate(), '%Y%m%d%H%i%s') , 'TkpSwingWireRsal' , DATE_FORMAT(sysdate(), '%Y%m%d%H%i%s' ))

INSERT /*+ TKPUKI08700_addBlineSupl_유선상품부가서비스 I/F 자료 저장_김연석_김연석 */ INTO TTKP_BLINE_SUPL ( SKB_SALE_NO , SKB_SALE_CHG_SEQ , SUPL_SEQ , SUPL_SVC_CD , PR_MNY_YN , DEL_YN , UPD_CNT , INS_USER_ID , INS_DTM , MOD_USER_ID , MOD_DTM) VALUES ( #{SKB_SALE_NO} , #{SKB_SALE_CHG_SEQ} , #{SUPL_SEQ} , #{SUPL_SVC_CD} , 'N' , 'N' , 1 , 'TkpSwingWireRsal' , DATE_FORMAT(sysdate(), '%Y%m%d%H%i%s') , 'TkpSwingWireRsal' , DATE_FORMAT(sysdate(), '%Y%m%d%H%i%s' ))
